details.sectionContent: Making a robo armed lift rover based on steering and lift mechanism.

Kits will be provided and participants will have to make a suitable mechanism on the spot. The team which will complete the track with maximum utilization of resources and in shortest time period will be declared as winner. Sufficient guidance will be provided regarding the model construction before the event.

A brief seminar regarding the model will be conducted mentioning about:
‣	Design considerations.
‣	Maximum utilization of available resources.
‣	Factors to be considered during model making.
‣	How to analyse your model.
In this round, students are supposed to create a model according to given task and under sufficient guidance.
Now finally itâ€™s time to test the performance of your model against other teams and emerge out as a winner.
